system:
note description: "Dialog constants. Standard strings displayed on " legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." date: "$Date: 2013-01-11 10:28:37 -0800 (Fri, 11 Jan 2013) $" revision: "$Revision: 90517 $"
class ../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xmlEV_DIALOG_CONSTANTS
create Falsedefault_create
feature -- Button Texts
f_ev_ok../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_okev_ok: FalseSTRING_8 -- Text displayed on "ok" buttons. do Result := "OK" end
f_ev_open../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_openev_open: FalseSTRING_8 -- Text displayed on "open" buttons. do Result := "Open" end
f_ev_save../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_saveev_save: FalseSTRING_8 -- Text displayed on "save" buttons. do Result := "Save" end
f_ev_print../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_printev_print: FalseSTRING_8 -- Text displayed on "print" buttons. do Result := "Print" end
f_ev_cancel../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_cancelev_cancel: FalseSTRING_8 -- Text displayed on "cancel" buttons. do Result := "Cancel" end
f_ev_yes../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_yesev_yes: FalseSTRING_8 -- Text displayed on "yes" buttons. do Result := "Yes" end
f_ev_no../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_noev_no: FalseSTRING_8 -- Text displayed on "no" buttons. do Result := "No" end
f_ev_abort../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_abortev_abort: FalseSTRING_8 -- Text displayed on "abort" buttons. do Result := "Abort" end
f_ev_retry../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_retryev_retry: FalseSTRING_8 -- Text displayed on "retry" buttons. do Result := "Retry" end
f_ev_ignore../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_ignoreev_ignore: FalseSTRING_8 -- Text displayed on "ignore" buttons. do Result := "Ignore" end
feature -- Titles
f_ev_warning_dialog_title../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_warning_dialog_titleev_warning_dialog_title: FalseSTRING_8 -- Title of EV_WARNING_DIALOG. do Result := "Warning" end
f_ev_question_dialog_title../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_question_dialog_titleev_question_dialog_title: FalseSTRING_8 -- Title of EV_QUESTION_DIALOG. do Result := "Question" end
f_ev_information_dialog_title../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_information_dialog_titleev_information_dialog_title: FalseSTRING_8 -- Title of EV_INFORMATION_DIALOG. do Result := "Information" end
f_ev_error_dialog_title../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_error_dialog_titleev_error_dialog_title: FalseSTRING_8 -- Title of EV_ERROR_DIALOG. do Result := "Error" end
f_ev_confirmation_dialog_title../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xml#f_ev_confirmation_dialog_titleev_confirmation_dialog_title: FalseSTRING_8 -- Title of EV_CONFIRMATION_DIALOG. do Result := "Confirmation" end

end -- class ../interface/ev_dialog_constants.xmlEV_DIALOG_CONSTANTS
